products.name: Eveline Cosmetics Wonder Match Creamy Liquid Matte Lipstick
products.description: A highly pigmented liquid matte lipstick that provides long-lasting color with a creamy finish.
products.howToApply: Apply evenly to lips using the applicator. Allow it to dry for a long-lasting matte finish.

products.name: MAC Glow Play Tender Talk Lip Balm
products.description: A hydrating lip balm with a natural tint that adjusts to your lip’s pH for a custom color.
products.howToApply: Apply directly to lips for hydration and a natural glow.

products.name: SUGAR Matte As Hell Mini Crayon Lipstick
products.description: A matte crayon lipstick that glides effortlessly and provides a bold color payoff.
products.howToApply: Outline your lips with the crayon and fill them in for a defined look.

products.name: COLORBAR Power Kiss Matte Lipstick
products.description: A lightweight matte lipstick with a smudge-proof formula that lasts all day.
products.howToApply: Swipe directly onto lips. Reapply as needed.

products.name: RENEE FAB 5 Matte Finish 5 in 1 Lipstick
products.description: A versatile 5-in-1 lipstick with a smooth matte finish, perfect for any occasion.
products.howToApply: Twist the lipstick to reveal the desired shade and apply to lips.

products.name: Prixa Love Eyeshadow Palette
products.description: A highly pigmented eyeshadow palette with vibrant and blendable shades.
products.howToApply: Use a brush or fingers to blend shades on eyelids.

products.name: Holy Grail Mini Hyper Real Kit
products.description: A mini skincare kit designed to provide hydration and a radiant glow.
products.howToApply: Apply products as per instructions for a complete skincare routine.

products.name: Karité Premium Superfood Cleansing Balm
products.description: A nourishing cleansing balm that removes makeup and impurities while keeping the skin hydrated.
products.howToApply: Massage onto dry skin and rinse off with warm water.

products.name: Eveline Cosmetics Body SHE Collagen Regeneration 200gm
products.description: A collagen-infused body cream that provides deep hydration and skin regeneration.
products.howToApply: Apply generously on the body and massage gently.

products.name: SWISS BEAUTY Cream It Up Blusher
products.description: A creamy blush that blends seamlessly, giving a natural flush to the cheeks.
products.howToApply: Dab onto cheeks using fingers or a brush and blend outwards.
